name: Your data is accessible to trading partners
title: JAGEX [BAD] You don't own virtual currency, and your use of it can be revoked at any time

tosdr.tldr: Your data is accessible to any of Spotify's trading partners. In addition, such data isn't expressly defined in the EULA.
